nodes.bodyText: .. or should we simply call this setDisabledDates?

I like setDisabledDates, can you also create a duplicate method called setDisabledDays that I think takes an array like [0,1] to turn off all Saturday's and Sundays if you look in the showcase and then refactor if they can share code?
Also don't forget to JSDoc the method since its public and poeple will want to know what disabledDates parameter is.
I tink this pdo.options for disabled dates has to get moved up to setDisabledDates method no?  It won't be used in the setDisabledDays() method.
I wonder if this should be marked @Private in the JSDocs?
